ygData.subject: RE: hero bracer quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Are the Shackles you guys are referring to the Iron Shackles from Korvik the Cursed in North Karana?  if so, what kind of a MOB IS he?  And what level? The
ygData.messageBody:
Are the Shackles you guys are referring to the Iron Shackles from Korvik the
Cursed in North Karana? if so, what kind of a MOB IS he? And what level?
The Hero bracer looks like an AWESOME addition to this halfling warriors
gear !! :)
Artimis of Bristlebane

-----Original Message-----
From: K [mailto:kayntwhyle@...]
Sent: Monday, September 20, 1999 4:00 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] hero bracer quest


From: "K" <kayntwhyle@...>

----- Original Message -----

: From: Lengland@...
:
: the npc to see for this quest is Brin Stolunger in the warrior guild in S.
Qeynos. I haven't done it myself as my Barbarian Warrior hasn't got high
enough faction rating yet(.

Great, thanks for posting info! :)

However... I have talked to this guy before as a little human warrior, he
starts the Strongbear bracers quest. When you hail him he yammers on about
[young steel warriors] and [spectators] to the Arena... what are the
keywords having to do with the Hero Bracer?

Thankfully I know how to raise my faction with them... I will do so tonight
with my higher-level character with the Shackles. Maybe Brin will
auto-detect when a high-level character speaks to him and give different
keywords upon hailing? Also... assuming that I have high enough faction, can
I just dump the Shackles on him and get the Bracer? Are you sure?

If you have more info please share, thank you very much.
